Pre-Game Insights: Argentina, the World Cup champions, managed to win all of their games from their group and finish first in Group A. Ecuador, on the other hand, finished second in Group B after losing to Venezuela and tying with Mexico.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Ecuadorians are still a strong team currently in fifth place in the World Cup qualifiers.
Others: Argentina should still be able to win, but it won't be as easy as their Group A games.
